actions.name: AssociateTeamMember
actions.description: Grants permission to add a user to the team for an AWS CodeStar project

actions.name: CreateProject
actions.description: Grants permission to create a project with minimal structure, customer policies, and no resources

actions.name: CreateUserProfile
actions.description: Grants permission to create a profile for a user that includes user preferences, display name, and email

actions.name: DeleteExtendedAccess
actions.description: Grants permission to extended delete APIs

actions.name: DeleteProject
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a project, including project resources. Does not delete users associated with the project, but does delete the IAM roles that allowed access to the project

actions.name: DeleteUserProfile
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a user profile in AWS CodeStar, including all personal preference data associated with that profile, such as display name and email address. It does not delete the history of that user, for example the history of commits made by that user

actions.name: DescribeProject
actions.description: Grants permission to describe a project and its resources

actions.name: DescribeUserProfile
actions.description: Grants permission to describe a user in AWS CodeStar and the user attributes across all projects

actions.name: DisassociateTeamMember
actions.description: Grants permission to remove a user from a project. Removing a user from a project also removes the IAM policies from that user that allowed access to the project and its resources

actions.name: GetExtendedAccess
actions.description: Grants permission to extended read APIs

actions.name: ListProjects
actions.description: Grants permission to list all projects in CodeStar associated with your AWS account

actions.name: ListResources
actions.description: Grants permission to list all resources associated with a project in CodeStar

actions.name: ListTagsForProject
actions.description: Grants permission to list the tags associated with a project in CodeStar

actions.name: ListTeamMembers
actions.description: Grants permission to list all team members associated with a project

actions.name: ListUserProfiles
actions.description: Grants permission to list user profiles in AWS CodeStar

actions.name: PutExtendedAccess
actions.description: Grants permission to extended write APIs

actions.name: TagProject
actions.description: Grants permission to add tags to a project in CodeStar

actions.name: UntagProject
actions.description: Grants permission to remove tags from a project in CodeStar

actions.name: UpdateProject
actions.description: Grants permission to update a project in CodeStar

actions.name: UpdateTeamMember
actions.description: Grants permission to update team member attributes within a CodeStar project

actions.name: UpdateUserProfile
actions.description: Grants permission to update a profile for a user that includes user preferences, display name, and email

actions.name: VerifyServiceRole
actions.description: Grants permission to verify whether the AWS CodeStar service role exists in the customer's account
